    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer from the sun to the earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung von der Sonne auf die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie à partir du soleil à la 
terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia do sol à terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia dal sole nella terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά από τον ήλιο στη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía del sol a la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Sun sending out energy to the Earth through empty space in the form of radiation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">empty space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Sonne, die Energie zur 
Masse durch leeren Platz in Form von Strahlung aussendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le soleil envoyant 
l'énergie à la terre par l'espace vide sous forme de rayonnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sol que emite para 
fora da energia à terra através do espaço vazio no formulário da 
radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il sole che spedisce 
l'energia alla terra attraverso lo spazio vuoto sotto forma di la 
radiazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τον ήλιο στέλνοντας την 
ενέργεια στη γη μέσω του κενού διαστήματος υπό μορφή 
ακτινοβολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el sol que envía 
energía a la tierra a través de espacio vacío en la forma de 
radiación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">leerer Platz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
